    • Constructor Detail

      • ModifiedChunker

        public ModifiedChunker(int chunkSize)
        Constructs a new ModifiedChunker using the default bit weightings. By default, the weight of an index is equal to the inverse of its index (more significant bits are less likely to change).
        Parameters:
        chunkSize -
